message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. This is a great deal, considering the product's value to you is $15000. I'm confident you'll love it!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'd like to get as close to my target price as possible.

I understand your target price, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go all the way down to $10000. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our initial offer and your counteroffer. I'll sell the product to you for $11500. This is a fair compromise, considering the product's value to you is $15000.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my target price. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $11250. Can you consider that?

I understand your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll sell the product to you for $11000. This is as close as I'm willing to go, considering the product's value to me is $8000. I hope this is acceptable to you.
